sources.title: Night Parade (1929)
sources.description: I've been researching newly public domain films from 1929 and earlier, so I'm uploading the best possible copies that I can find. Night Parade is an early boxing-themed drama that would have inspired other boxing talkies of the era. In modern views it is mostly forgotten, as none of the stars were icons of the era, and reviews and box office were average. It is notable for being one of the few films that lead Hugh Trevor acted in before his untimely death.

sources.title: Night Parade (1929) Pre-Code Boxing Drama | Hugh Trevor
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Night Parade (1929) PRE-CODE FIGHT FILM, FULL MOVIE
Stars: Hugh Trevor, Dorothy Gulliver, Aileen Pringle
Directed by: Malcolm St. Clair
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TUzR3YhpzxOuBM6YrZ91UVG
Where would movies be without boxing? The Harder They Fall. The Set-Up. Raging Bull. Rocky. Stories written in blood, sweat...and silence. Back in ‘29, before those heavyweights ever threw a punch, RKO stepped into the ring with an undefeated champ, a dangerous dame, and a fight game that hit below the belt. 

Experience a classic blend of romance, ambition, and boxing drama with this early talkie from RKO Radio Pictures, directed by Malcolm St. Clair. Hugh Trevor stars as a rising boxer whose success in the ring is threatened by manipulation and romantic entanglements. Dorothy Gulliver plays the trainer’s daughter who captures the boxer’s heart, while Robert Ellis shines as the smooth-talking promoter with his own agenda. 

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every WEEK on PizzaFLIX.

This pre-Code gem offers a glimpse into the world of professional prizefighting, set against the backdrop of ambition, jealousy, and high-stakes relationships.
#NightParade1929 #HughTrevor #DorothyGulliver #AileenPringle
#MalcolmStClair #RKORadioPictures #PreCodeHollywood
#BoxingDrama #ClassicMovieMonday
#PizzaFLIX

metadata.Plot: Bobby Martin, a young middleweight champion boxer, is an honest and decent fighter. However, on the eve of his biggest fight, he becomes entangled in the snare of a dishonest woman and ends up framed.
metadata.Writer: Hyatt Daab, Edward E. Paramore Jr., George Abbott
metadata.Actors: Aileen Pringle, Hugh Trevor, Dorothy Gulliver
